trans-unit.source: Exposes and updates membership user information stored in an Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: Expone y actualiza información de usuario de pertenencia almacenada en un almacén de datos de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object is used to represent a single membership user in the Active Directory membership data store.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto se usa para representar un usuario de pertenencia único en el almacén de datos de pertenencia de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: It exposes information about the membership user such as the email address, and provides functionality for the membership user such as the ability to change or reset his or her password.
trans-unit.target: Expone información sobre el usuario de pertenencia, como la dirección de correo electrónico y proporciona funcionalidad para el usuario de pertenencia como la capacidad de cambiar o restablecer su contraseña.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object is returned by the application's membership provider whenever the application is configured to use an Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto devuelto por el proveedor de pertenencia de la aplicación cada vez que la aplicación está configurada para usar un almacén de datos de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: In an application that can be configured to use different data stores, or in an application that uses multiple data stores, you can refer to the base class, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>.
trans-unit.target: En una aplicación que se pueden configurar para utilizar datos diferentes almacenes, o en una aplicación que usa varios almacenes de datos, puede hacer referencia a la clase base, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object does not implement the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> properties, you must be prepared to handle the <xref:System.NotSupportedException> that is thrown when these members are accessed on an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object.
trans-unit.target: Dado que el <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto no implementa la <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> y <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> propiedades, es preciso estar preparado para controlar la <xref:System.NotSupportedException> que se produce cuando se tiene acceso a estos miembros en un <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> class implements internal optimizations used by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> class to minimize the number of attribute updates that occur when calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> clase implementa optimizaciones internas utilizadas por la <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> clase para minimizar el número de actualizaciones de atributos que se producen cuando se llama a la <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: It also serializes the <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> representation (available in the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> property) so that an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object can be serialized and deserialized without throwing exceptions.
trans-unit.target: También serializa el <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> representación (disponible en la <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> propiedad) para que un <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto se puede serializar y deserializar sin producir excepciones.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object is returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> methods or as part of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto devuelto por la <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> y <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> métodos o como parte de un <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> devuelto por la <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, y <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object is required by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method when you want to update the information for an existing membership user.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto requerido por la <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> método cuando desee actualizar la información de un usuario de pertenencia existente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> properties are mapped to Active Directory attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> propiedades se asignan a atributos de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> properties and their default attribute mappings.
trans-unit.target: La siguiente tabla se recogen los <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> asignaciones de atributo de propiedades y su valor predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Default directory attribute
trans-unit.target: Atributo de directorio predeterminado

trans-unit.source: Can be mapped?
trans-unit.target: ¿Se pueden asignar?

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: No

trans-unit.source: Yes, but must be either userPrincipalName or sAMAccountName
trans-unit.target: Sí, pero debe ser userPrincipalName o sAMAccountName

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: No

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: No

trans-unit.source: Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.
trans-unit.target: Sí, pero debe ser un atributo de un solo valor de tipo Unicode String.

trans-unit.source: n/a
trans-unit.target: N/D

trans-unit.source: Not supported by <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: No se admite por <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.

trans-unit.source: n/a
trans-unit.target: N/D

trans-unit.source: Not supported by <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: No se admite por <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: No

trans-unit.source: none, but must be mapped to an attribute if using question-and-answer security for password reset or retrieval.
trans-unit.target: Ninguno, pero deben asignarse a un atributo si utilizando la seguridad de la pregunta y respuesta para la recuperación o el restablecimiento de contraseña.

trans-unit.source: Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.
trans-unit.target: Sí, pero debe ser un atributo de un solo valor de tipo Unicode String.

trans-unit.source: `User-Account-Control` (AD)
trans-unit.target: `User-Account-Control` (AD)

trans-unit.source: `mDS-UserAccountDisabled` (ADAM)
trans-unit.target: `mDS-UserAccountDisabled` (ADAM)

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: No

trans-unit.source: computed from `lockoutTime` and the AD lockout duration (AD on Windows 2000)
trans-unit.target: calcular a partir de `lockoutTime` y la duración del bloqueo de AD (AD en Windows 2000)

trans-unit.source: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (AD on Windows Server 2003)
trans-unit.target: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (AD en Windows Server 2003)

trans-unit.source: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (ADAM)
trans-unit.target: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (ADAM)

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: No

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to too many bad password attempts, the lockout time attribute is returned.
trans-unit.target: Si se bloquea debido a demasiados intentos de contraseña incorrecta, se devuelve el atributo de tiempo de bloqueo.

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to too many bad password answer attempts, the value stored in the attribute defined by `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` is returned.
trans-unit.target: Si se bloquea debido a la respuesta de contraseña incorrecta demasiadas intentos, el valor almacenado en el atributo definido por `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` se devuelve.

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to both a bad password and too many bad password attempts, the most recent date/time value is returned.
trans-unit.target: Si se bloquea debido a una contraseña incorrecta y contraseña incorrecta demasiadas intentos, se devuelve el valor de fecha y hora más reciente.

trans-unit.source: If the account is not locked out, return 1/1/1753 for SQL compatibility.
trans-unit.target: Si la cuenta no está bloqueada, devuelve 1/1/1753 por compatibilidad con SQL.

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: No

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using properties on the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object on a Web page that may return user information from multiple membership data stores.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar propiedades en la <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto en una página Web que puede devolver información de usuario de varios almacenes de datos de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object that underlies the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> object returned by the membership provider does not implement the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> properties, the code first checks the type of the user object returned from the membership provider before displaying the contents of those properties.
trans-unit.target: Porque el <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto subyacente a la <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> objeto devuelto por el proveedor de pertenencia no implementa la <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> y <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> propiedades, el código comprueba primero el tipo del objeto de usuario devuelto de la pertenencia proveedor antes de mostrar el contenido de esas propiedades.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser" /> object for a class that inherits the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser" /> para una clase que hereda la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.%23ctor%2A> constructor is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.%23ctor%2A> constructor no está pensado para usarse desde el código.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName" /> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName" /> del usuario de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName" /> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName" /> del usuario de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey" /> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey" /> del usuario de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email" /> address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Dirección <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email" /> del usuario de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion" /> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion" /> del usuario de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment" /> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment" /> del usuario de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved" /> value for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Valor de la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved" /> del usuario de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut" /> value for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Valor de la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut" /> del usuario de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate" /> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate" /> del usuario de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate" /> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate" /> del usuario de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Este parámetro no se utiliza.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate" /> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate" /> del usuario de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Este parámetro no se utiliza.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate" /> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate" /> del usuario de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate" /> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate" /> del usuario de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser" /> class with the specified property values.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser" /> con los valores de propiedades especificados.

trans-unit.source: Creating a new <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object does not add a new membership user object to the membership data store.
trans-unit.target: Crear un nuevo <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto no agrega un nuevo objeto de usuario de pertenencia en el almacén de datos de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: To add a new membership user to the membership data store, use the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para agregar un nuevo usuario de pertenencia en el almacén de datos de pertenencia, utilice el <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object for the membership user added to the data store.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que la <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> método devuelve un <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto para el usuario de pertenencia agregado al almacén de datos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objects are commonly constructed in application code for use with the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method, although you can also pass an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object returned from the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> method to the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method as well.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> Normalmente se construyen objetos en el código de aplicación para su uso con el <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> (método), aunque también puede pasar un <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objeto devuelto desde el <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> método para el <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> método así.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objects are also commonly constructed by membership provider implementations for the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> los objetos se construyen también normalmente por las implementaciones del proveedor de pertenencia para la <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, y <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="providerUserKey" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="providerUserKey" /> no es un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="providerName" /> is <see langword="null" /> and a provider is not set in the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="providerName" /> es <see langword="null" /> y no se establece un proveedor en el archivo de configuración de la aplicación.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets application-specific information for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la información específica de la aplicación para el usuario de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: Application-specific information for the Active Directory member stored in the <see langword="Comment" /> directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: Información específica de la aplicación para el miembro de Active Directory almacenado en el atributo de directorio <see langword="Comment" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A> property can be used to store custom information for a membership user that is specific to an application.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A> propiedad puede utilizarse para almacenar información personalizada para un usuario de pertenencia que es específico de una aplicación.

trans-unit.source: The amount of information that can be stored in the `Comment` property for an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> is defined by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: La cantidad de información que se pueden almacenar en la `Comment` propiedad para un <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> está definida por el <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A> property is mapped to the `Comment` default Active Directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A> propiedad se asigna a la `Comment` atributos de Active Directory de manera predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad no se puede reasignar a otro atributo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the email address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la dirección de correo electrónico del usuario de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: The email address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: La dirección de correo electrónico del usuario de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A> property is mapped to the `Mail` directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A> propiedad se asigna a la `Mail` atributos de directorio.

trans-unit.source: This property can be remapped in the Web.config file by setting the `attributeMapUserName` attribute in the [providers Element for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) element for profiles.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad se puede reasignar en el archivo Web.config estableciendo el `attributeMapUserName` de atributo en el [elemento providers para profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) (elemento) para los perfiles.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the membership user can be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si se puede autenticar el usuario de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user can be authenticated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si se puede autenticar al usuario; en caso contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> value for a membership user is checked during the call to <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> el valor de un usuario de pertenencia se comprueba durante la llamada a <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> por la <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A> property returns `false`, the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method returns `false` even if the supplied user name and password are correct.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A> propiedad devuelve `false`, el <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> método `false` incluso si el nombre de usuario proporcionado y la contraseña son correctos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A> property is mapped to one of the following Active Directory attributes.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A> propiedad se asigna a uno de los siguientes atributos de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Grafo de

trans-unit.source: Active Directory Application Mode
trans-unit.target: Modo de aplicación de Active Directory

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad no se puede reasignar a otro atributo.

trans-unit.source: Throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> exception in all cases
trans-unit.target: Produce una excepción <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> en todos los casos.

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> exception.
trans-unit.target: Siempre produce una excepción <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> property is not supported by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> propiedad no es compatible con la <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> clase.

trans-unit.source: Attempting to get or set the value will always throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Al intentar obtener o establecer el valor, siempre se producirá un <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to determine whether the underlying type of a membership user is <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>, and to avoid throwing a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> for accessing the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: Throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> exception in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Se produce una excepción <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> en todos los casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Recibe el identificador de usuario del almacén de datos de Active Directory para el usuario de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: The user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Identificador de usuario del almacén de datos de Active Directory para el usuario de pertenencia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> property exposes the identifier from the membership data source generically typed as an `object`.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> propiedad expone el identificador de la pertenencia al origen de datos escrito de forma genérica como un `object`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> class can be cast as a <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> object.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> se puede convertir la clase como un <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> property in Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) format by converting it to a <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> object.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente código en el ejemplo se muestra la <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> propiedad en formato de lenguaje de definición de descriptores de seguridad (SDDL) convirtiéndolo en un <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para el código completo necesario para ejecutar el ejemplo, vea la sección ejemplo de la <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> tema de información general sobre la clase.
